channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Emotionally Unavailable? 5 Practices To Help You Open Up, Fast
item.description: Practice 1: Hold up the energetic mirror.

item.title: The West Texas Measles Outbreak Has Ended
item.description: According to state health officials, a measles outbreak that started in an undervaccinated community and killed two children is now over.

item.title: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $11 million. We’re not leaving it to our kids. Is that wrong?
item.description: “We have retired from full-time work.”

item.title: Palantir’s stock is sliding. Here’s why this short-seller thinks even a $40 price tag is ‘generous.’
